m64custom.name: 3D-Coins
m64custom.description: Import a 3D-Coin Model and automaticly apply the codes.

Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic Imports System Imports System.Linq Imports System.IO Imports SM64Lib Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports SM64Lib.Model.Fast3D Imports SM64Lib.Model Imports SM64Lib.Data Imports System.Drawing Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports Devcomponents.DotNetBar Imports SM64Lib.SegmentedBanking
Module Script
Sub Main(params As IReadOnlyDictionary(Of String, Object)) Dim mdl As ObjectModel = params("ConvertedModel") Dim buf As Fast3DBuffer = mdl.Fast3DBuffer Dim stream As New FileStream(params("romfile"), FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite) Dim data As New BinaryStreamData(stream) Dim offset As Integer = params("RomAddress") Dim geopointer As Integer = CType(params("GeoPointersArray"), Integer()).FirstOrDefault Dim bank03addr As Integer = SegmentedBanks.Bank0x3RomStart Dim jumpvalue As Integer = &H3000000
'Navigate to Display List data.Position = geopointer data.Position = data.ReadInt32 - &H3000000 + bank03addr
'Search 03 commands Dim cmd As Byte = 0 Dim found03 As Integer = 0 Dim ende As Boolean = False
Do cmd = data.ReadByte Select Case cmd Case &HB8 ende = True Case &H3 found03 += 1 If found03 = 2 Then jumpvalue = data.Position + 7 - bank03addr + &H3000000 End If End Select data.Position += 7 Loop Until ende
'Write jumpvalue to 03 commands for the yellow and blue coins data.Position = &HAB9B64 'AB9B20 data.Write(jumpvalue) data.Position = &HAB9BB4 'AB9B70 data.Write(jumpvalue)
'Get coin colors Dim colors as Colors3DCoin = GetColors
'Navigate to color in new model data.Position = jumpvalue + bank03addr - &H3000000 - &HA data.Position = data.ReadUInt16 + bank03addr
'Write red coin color to new model colors WriteColor(data, colors.RedLight) WriteColor(data, colors.RedDark)
'Goto & Write colors for yellow coin data.Position = &H30076A4 - &H3000000 + bank03addr WriteColor(data, colors.YellowLight) data.Position = &H30076AC - &H3000000 + bank03addr WriteColor(data, colors.YellowDark)
'Goto & Write colors for blue coin data.Position = &H30076B4 - &H3000000 + bank03addr WriteColor(data, colors.BlueLight) data.Position = &H30076BC - &H3000000 + bank03addr WriteColor(data, colors.BlueDark)
stream.Close() End Sub
Function GetColors as Colors3DCoin Dim frm as new GetColorsDialog frm.Text = "Edit Coins Color"
Dim colors as New Colors3DCoin frm.LoadColors(colors)
frm.ShowDialog
frm.SaveColors(colors)
return colors End Function
Sub WriteColor(data as BinaryData, color as Color) data.WriteByte(color.R) data.WriteByte(color.G) data.WriteByte(color.B) data.WriteByte(&HFF) 'color.A data.WriteByte(color.R) data.WriteByte(color.G) data.WriteByte(color.B) data.WriteByte(&HFF) 'color.A End Sub
End Module

Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic Imports System Imports System.Linq Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports System.IO Imports SM64Lib Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports SM64Lib.Model imports System.Reflection
Module Script
Sub Main(params as IReadOnlyDictionary(Of String, Object)) Dim myDataPath as string = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(Assembly.GetEntryAssembly().Location), "Data")
'Get Paths Dim p_romfile as string = params("romfile") Dim p_ppf as string = Path.Combine(myDataPath, "Patchs\3D-Coins\Apply 3D Coins.ppf")
'Patch 3D-Coins Patch General.PatchClass.ApplyPPF(p_romfile, p_ppf)
'Remove Collision from Model Dim mdl As ObjectModel = params("ConvertedModel") mdl.Collision = Nothing
End Sub
End Module
